title: In post-Covid poll, Americans say they are "thriving"
description:
As troops leave Afghanistan, Sen. Jack Reed (D-R.I.) talks about what the end to America’s longest war may mean for our influence on the world stage. Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-Ill.) discusses the influence of far-right extremism in the GOP.

Carrie Dann’s final number of the week looks at Americans’ optimistic feelings about the future.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded:
As troops leave Afghanistan, Sen. Jack Reed (D-R.I.) talks about what the end to America’s longest war may mean for our influence on the world stage. Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-Ill.) discusses the influence of far-right extremism in the GOP.

itunes:title: In post-Covid poll, Americans say they are "thriving"
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: Plus, Chuck recaps his interviews with Sen. Jack Reed (D-R.I.) and Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-Ill.) as American forces withdraw from Afghanistan.
